amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be obligated, expended, or used in any manner to support military operations, including NATO or United Nations operations, in Libya or in Libya's airspace.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be obligated, expended, or used in any manner to support military operations, including NATO or United Nations operations, in Libya or in Libya's airspace.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 265 (Roll no. 520).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 265 (Roll no. 520).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
